dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.spanish: Buenos días. ¿Qué te trae por aquí?
dialog.english: Good morning. What brings you here?

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Buenos días. Me duele la cabeza y tengo un poco de fiebre.
dialog.english: Good morning. My head hurts and I have a bit of a fever.

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.english: Since when have you been feeling this way?

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Empecé a sentirme mal ayer por la noche.
dialog.english: I started feeling bad last night.

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.english: I see. Do you have any other symptoms?

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Estoy un poco mareado y tengo escalofríos.
dialog.english: I'm a little dizzy and have chills.

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Me caí y me torcí el tobillo.
dialog.english: I fell and twisted my ankle.

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Sí, me duele bastante cuando camino.
dialog.english: Yes, it hurts quite a bit when I walk.

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.spanish: Vamos a revisarlo. Por favor, siéntate en la camilla.
dialog.english: Let's check it. Please sit on the table.

questions.question: ¿Dónde le pide el doctor que se siente?

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.spanish: Después del examen, creo que tienes un resfriado común.
dialog.english: After the exam, I believe you have a common cold.

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.english: Oh, and what should I do?

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.spanish: Tome esta medicina tres veces al día con las comidas y descanse mucho.
dialog.english: Take this medicine three times a day with meals and rest a lot.

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.spanish: Por cinco días. Si no mejoras, llámame.
dialog.english: For five days. If you don't get better, call me.

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.spanish: Gracias, doctor. Me siento mejor con su ayuda.
dialog.english: Thank you, doctor. I feel better with your help.

sentences.spanish: Elena no se sentía bien. Tenía dolor de cabeza y fiebre, así que decidió llamar a la clínica.
sentences.english: Elena wasn't feeling well. She had a headache and a fever, so she decided to call the clinic.

sentences.spanish: La recepcionista le dio una cita para la tarde con el doctor González.
sentences.english: The receptionist gave her an appointment for the afternoon with Doctor González.

sentences.spanish: Al llegar, la enfermera le preguntó cuáles eran sus síntomas.
sentences.english: Upon arriving, the nurse asked her what her symptoms were.

sentences.spanish: Elena explicó que le dolía la garganta y se sentía muy cansada.
sentences.english: Elena explained that her throat hurt and she felt very tired.

sentences.spanish: Cuando el doctor la vio, le preguntó: —¿Qué te duele, Elena?
sentences.english: When the doctor saw her, he asked: —What hurts, Elena?

sentences.spanish: Ella respondió: —Tengo dolor de garganta y me duele el cuerpo, doctor.
sentences.english: She replied: —I have a sore throat and my body aches, doctor.

sentences.spanish: Después de un examen rápido, el doctor dijo: —Parece que tienes una gripe leve.
sentences.english: After a quick exam, the doctor said: —It seems you have a mild flu.

sentences.spanish: Le dio una receta para medicina y le aconsejó: —Toma esta medicina dos veces al día y descansa mucho.
sentences.english: He gave her a prescription for medicine and advised her: —Take this medicine twice a day and rest a lot.

sentences.spanish: Elena se sintió aliviada. —Gracias, doctor, por su ayuda. —De nada, Elena. ¡Recupérate pronto!
sentences.english: Elena felt relieved. —Thank you, doctor, for your help. —You're welcome, Elena. Get well soon!

sentences.spanish: Luis estaba jugando fútbol cuando se cayó.
sentences.english: Luis was playing soccer when he fell.

sentences.spanish: Sintió un dolor agudo en su pierna y supo que algo estaba mal.
sentences.english: He felt a sharp pain in his leg and knew something was wrong.

sentences.spanish: Su amigo lo ayudó a llegar a la clínica de deportes.
sentences.english: His friend helped him get to the sports clinic.

sentences.spanish: El doctor le hizo un examen médico y le preguntó: —¿Dónde está el dolor?
sentences.english: The doctor gave him a medical exam and asked: —Where is the pain?

sentences.spanish: Luis señaló su tobillo y dijo: —Me duele mucho aquí.
sentences.english: Luis pointed to his ankle and said: —It hurts a lot here.

sentences.spanish: El doctor le tomó una radiografía y encontró que tenía un hueso roto.
sentences.english: The doctor took an X-ray and found that he had a broken bone.

sentences.spanish: Le dio una inyección para el dolor y le explicó el tratamiento.
sentences.english: He gave him an injection for the pain and explained the treatment.

sentences.spanish: Luis se sintió triste, pero agradecido por la ayuda.
sentences.english: Luis felt sad, but grateful for the help.

sentences.spanish: Ana salió del consultorio con una receta para el jarabe.
sentences.english: Ana left the doctor's office with a prescription for syrup.

sentences.spanish: Fue directamente a la farmacia.
sentences.english: She went directly to the pharmacy.

sentences.spanish: Le entregó la receta a la farmacéutica.
sentences.english: She handed the prescription to the pharmacist.

sentences.spanish: La farmacéutica la preparó y le explicó las instrucciones.
sentences.english: The pharmacist prepared it and explained the instructions.

sentences.spanish: Ana preguntó: —¿Necesito analgésicos también?
sentences.english: Ana asked: —Do I need painkillers too?

sentences.spanish: La farmacéutica respondió: —La receta no los incluye, pero puedes comprarlos sin problema.
sentences.english: The pharmacist replied: —The prescription doesn't include them, but you can buy them without a problem.

sentences.spanish: Ana compró el jarabe y los analgésicos.
sentences.english: Ana bought the syrup and the painkillers.

sentences.spanish: Se sintió más tranquila sabiendo que ya tenía la medicina para empezar a sentirse mejor.
sentences.english: She felt calmer knowing she now had the medicine to start feeling better.

speaking.title: Medicina
speaking.description: Preguntas y respuestas para describir síntomas, pedir ayuda médica y entender tratamientos.

question.english: What hurts?

answer.spanish: Me duele la garganta y la cabeza.
answer.english: My throat and head hurt.

question.english: Do you have a fever?

answer.spanish: Sí, tengo fiebre. Me siento muy mal.
answer.english: Yes, I have a fever. I feel very bad.

question.english: How do you feel?

answer.spanish: Estoy un poco mareado y cansado.
answer.english: I'm a little dizzy and tired.

question.english: What does 'Estoy enfermo' mean?

answer.spanish: Significa 'I am sick'.
answer.english: It means 'I am sick'.

question.english: Do you need an appointment with the doctor?

answer.spanish: Sí, necesito una cita lo antes posible.
answer.english: Yes, I need an appointment as soon as possible.

question.english: What are painkillers for?

answer.spanish: Los analgésicos son para el dolor.
answer.english: Painkillers are for pain.

question.english: Where can you buy medicine?

answer.spanish: Puedes comprar medicina en la farmacia.
answer.english: You can buy medicine at the pharmacy.

question.english: What does the doctor prescribe you?

answer.spanish: El doctor me receta una pastilla para el dolor.
answer.english: The doctor prescribes me a pill for the pain.

question.english: When should you take the medicine?

answer.spanish: Debo tomar la medicina tres veces al día.
answer.english: I should take the medicine three times a day.

question.english: What does 'Recupérate pronto' mean?

answer.spanish: Significa 'Get well soon'.
answer.english: It means 'Get well soon'.

question.english: Does your back hurt?

answer.spanish: Sí, tengo dolor de espalda después de trabajar.
answer.english: Yes, I have back pain after working.

question.spanish: ¿Cómo te sientes después de tomar la medicina?
question.english: How do you feel after taking the medicine?

answer.spanish: Me siento un poco mejor ahora.
answer.english: I feel a little better now.

question.english: What do you do when you feel bad?

answer.spanish: Cuando me siento mal, descanso mucho.
answer.english: When I feel bad, I rest a lot.

question.english: Why is it important to rest?

answer.spanish: Es importante para que el cuerpo se recupere.
answer.english: It's important so the body can recover.

question.english: Have you had a recent medical exam?

answer.spanish: Sí, tuve un examen médico el mes pasado.
answer.english: Yes, I had a medical exam last month.

question.english: What is a consultation?

answer.spanish: Es una reunión con el doctor para hablar de tu salud.
answer.english: It's a meeting with the doctor to talk about your health.

question.english: What does 'Tengo dolor de estómago' mean?

answer.spanish: Significa 'I have a stomachache'.
answer.english: It means 'I have a stomachache'.

question.english: What hurts if you fall?

answer.spanish: Si me caigo, me puede doler una pierna o el brazo.
answer.english: If I fall, my leg or arm might hurt.

question.english: Do you have any flu symptoms?

answer.spanish: Sí, tengo tos y dolor de garganta.
answer.english: Yes, I have a cough and a sore throat.

question.english: What is an injection used for?

answer.spanish: Se usa una inyección para dar medicina rápido.
answer.english: An injection is used to give medicine quickly.
